H0.text: Name Microsoft's hands-free gaming system launched in June 2010, a made-up word alluding to joining. Connex

H2.text: Name Microsoft's hands-free gaming system launched in June 2010, a made-up word alluding to joining. Nexa

H3.text: Name Microsoft's hands-free gaming system launched in June 2010, a made-up word alluding to joining. Kinect

A4.text: Project Natal would be officially branded as Kinect
